TEXT.S:
Gambiau Gambiasa i labu nu Africa, itiza i 13 28 N, 16 34 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 11,300 km2. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 10,120 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 1,180 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 2,009,648. kakalukan umah sa 56.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 43.90%, zumaay henay umah sa 0%. caay kau cabayay a kanatal nu Taywan. Gambiatadangangan Gambia kapulungan a kanatal. Gambiau saadidi'ay nu Africaa kanatal, u lala' nuheni mala tulu nu cacayay nu Taywan.[1] (u kamu nu Hulam: "(Republic of the Gambia)"⅓.)
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Banjul.
sapadateng nu kanatal demiadsapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 18 bulad 2 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung) ayza sa ci Adama Barrow, micakat a demiad sa i 2017 a mihca 1 bulad 19 demiad.
kakitidaan"" Kan-piya (Gambiaitida i Fa-cuo (Africanutipan, nutipan mitepal tu Tasi-yingwayway nu lala masa wali nutipan nu satanayu sananay a enalan, amis,wali, timul u hekal malaup nu Senegal, u kacaledesan nu lutuklutukan a demiad.[2] ""40~50""5.79240""Kuntaur pulung nu kanatal i Kanpi-ya "Gambiasauwac nu masatanayuay a enal a lala'", isasa ku lala' masaenal, talakaw han makaala tu sepat a pulu' ~ lima a pulu' a lawat (depah, ). Kanpi-ya (Gambiasauwac makayda tu wali nutipan, pisilsilan nu nanum pasayda i Tasi-yung. macacelcel ku nanum, idaw ku yadahay nu puu'an nananumam mala lanulanuan (katukuhan ku puu'an maenep tu malaanu'), adidi'ay a balunga paimihecaan taneng mililis tu Kanpi-ya (Gambiasauwac katukuh i walian. kaudadan hantu, mukatu nanumnu 5.79 a lawat (depah ) a balungan, midungdung tu sawac tapabaw tu 240 km, katukuh i Kuntaw-el (Kuntal.[3]
tademaw20090% tademaw nu Kanpi-ya (Gambiatusa a lasubu (200) a mang, siwa a bataan a kilac (90%) nu tademaw nisiziaan nuheni han u islam a kiwkay.[4]
duma a tademaw han u kelisetu a kiway. Kapi-ya (Gambiaa tademaw misuayaw tina tusaay a kiwkay nu pihibangan, masasungaay namin kunuheni. 95% Kapi-ya (Gambiaa binacadan caay kasasu laecus ku nuheni. u binacadan unu udiptu ku kamu atu lisin. iguhan tada kamu nu Kapi-ya (Gambia. u Kanpi-ya (Gambiaa tademaw siwa a bataan idaw ku lima a kilac (95%) u Muslim (Mu-Se-Lin ) a tademaw, sisa u Kapi-ya (Gambiamilihida micumud tu iselan kapulungan nu kakaygiyan.[5] 566 Kapi-ya (Gambiasacaaya kacemulak nu kitakit a kanatal, nu limaay a mihecaan nu wawa mapatay han makaala tu enem a kilacan, pakuyuc kuni kaudipan (tantanengsa ku sakaudip nuheni u saadidiay ku sausi) u tademawan han milakuud tu enemay a kilacan. malaliya, aycepin, AIDS, bala' haykikac a imelang han masaadada nuheni.[6]
laylay"""" Kapi-ya (Gambianaw Ghana Ti-Kuoatu Songhai-Ti-Kuoa niyadu'. 910 nikilukan nu sasulitan sa, satabalay namakayda i siwaay a se-ci atu cacay a bataan a se-ci nu Arabiamisiwbaya a tademaw. "" Arabiamisiwbaya a tademaw patideng milakuud tu "Sahara likelikenan" anipisiwbay a dadan, pacakay tu kalung, u kim atu ngipen nu zu'. 15 sabaw tu lima a se-ci nu Portugala tademaw debung nuheni ku Gambia, i bayubayuan patideng tu sasiwbayan a dadan. "" tawyaay a Gambiau "Mali Ti-Kuo" a kitidaan.[7] 16 sabaw tu enem a se-ci, United Kindomatu Francea tademaw mabulaw makatukuh itida a niyaduan. 1783cacay a malebut pitu a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku tulu (1783) a mihcaan "Funel-say (Versailles" hiyan ku Gambia sauwaca dadipasan malatusa pababenisan sipabeli i United Kindom, Senegalbabenisa mala Francea lala'.[8] 3003 itida i tulu a lasubu (300) a mihecaan milawit tu Tasi-yunga kalung nu misiwbayan, makaala tu tulu a lasubu a mang 300ku kalung alan miliyas tina kitidaan.[9] 1965218""Dawda Jawara19947 (Yahya Jammeh)(Dawda Jawara)"" cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku lima (1965) a mihcaan tusa a bulad sabaw tu pitu a demiad, Gambiatatengan misiteked, "kuo-fu" co Dawda Jawaramatenes kunipikuwan. cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku sepat (1994) a mihcaan pituay a bulad, Gambiaa gukugunga cong-weyci Yahya Jammeh (·) palekal tu sasasuada nu hitay, belinen nida ci Cia-Wa-La (Dawda Jawara), patideng tu " hitay a icelang nipilinziyan tu sapikuwan tu wi-yuang-hyei". 1996920011020069201111 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku enem a mihcaan siwa a bulat, maala ci Yahya Jammeh (·) mala Cong-tung, tusa a malebut idaw ku cacay (2001) a mihcaan cacay a bataan a bulad, tusa a malebut idaw ku enem (2006) a mihcaan siwaay a bulad, tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay (2011) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay a bulat kina tulu matulin mala Cung-tung. 201512"(The Islamic Republic of The Gambia)""(The Islamic State)" tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku lima (2015) a mihcaan saba tusa a bulad, Yahya Jammeh (·) mihapu misumad tu ngangan nu kanatal u "Gambia Islamic kapulungan a kanatal" "(The Islamic Republic of The Gambia)", amica atu sakatalawan a kaput u "yi-se-lan-kuo Islamic kanatalThe Islamic State)" nai'ku hica , nika u ngangan nu kanatal malecad, sisa itini i kitakit nu siakayan idaw tu kunika sasulawlawan. [10] 2017129.Adama BarrowRepublic of the Gambia tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku pitu a (2017) a mihcaan cacay a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku siwa a demiad, Cong-tungci Adama Barrow (.), sumaded ku ngangan nu kanatal patalumaen naca pala "Gambia kapulungan a kanatal (, Republic of the Gambia) han. [11]
kanatalay nikalalacalan a malcabayKapi-ya (GambiaTaywan atu Chinaa nikalecabay, mahicay kya kuni kalecaay. 19681 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku walu (1968) a mihcaan cacay a bulad, Kapi-ya (Gambiaatu Taywan masasungaay kuni kalecaby. 197412 cacay a malebau siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan idaw ku sepat (1974) a mihcaan sabaw tu tusa a bulad maputung kuni kalecabayan, Kapi-ya (Gambiaatu Chinamalecabay. 19957 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a lasubu idaw ku lima (1995) a mihcaan pitu a bulad, Kapi-yaatu Taywan mutikuaca malecabay. maputung kuni kalecabay tu cuokuo. 201311 tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (2013) a mihcaan sabaw tu cacay a bulad, Kapi-yaatu Taywan maputun naca kuni kalecabay, 2016320Yahya Jammeh tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku enem (2016) a mihecaan tulu a bulad, Kapi-yaatu Chinamalecabay yaca. sabelibelih' sa kunikalecabay, uidakuhan mangalay mikuwan tu tusa a bataan a apina nu mihecaan ci Yehay.ciame (Yahya Jammeh (·) European UnionYahya Jammeh2010 hatidaay nutenes, u idaw tu kunipipadang nu O-mun (European Uniontu Kapi-ya, nika ci Yahya Jammeh (·) cen-fumidebung palula'cus tu tadecaw, yadah ku cumin. amica ku O-mun (European Unionmiyukiw tu sakakapah, nika Cong-tung ci Yahya Jammeh (·) kaisa misakapah. sisa i tusa a malebut cacay a bataan (2010) a mihcaan malingatu, O-mun (European Unionputun hatu ku sapipadang tu Gambiaan .[12]
sakaliyumah"" makedal ku lala', kalitang ku sakaudip nu langaw nuheni, u kalitang ku yadahay nu kakuliyan, kalitang ku kakakulian nu Kapi-ya (Gambia.
dumasatu u idaw kunipaluma' tu tipus atu kubkub, hatiday nu ahebalay nu lala' pakunida han caay kaluki malatadas. kaliwmahan han itidasa i kaudadan a puu'an a paluma, nipaluma'an tu tuud caay kataneng amaudip, kanca anamaka nutalwan a kanatal pacumud tu kakanen.[13]
